name: Hasta 2190
description:
Hasta 2190 is Columbus State Community College project for the Game Developer and Artist courses. Currently in pre-alpha state, this is a protoype that displays a arcade-style co-op horde survival game. The game supports 4 controllers, with keyboard functionality in development.

The goal is to survive 5 minutes and earn enough points to beat the level. New levels and game play is already underway.

This game has a lot of bugs and issues. We will update it weekly to bring you a working game

Instructions:
Left thumbstick moves the player

Right thumb stick fires in the direction pushed

Health packs restore any lost health
